Plot: An emotional thriller based on a road trip from Mumbai to Pune. Inspired from the real events that happened in Chennai
Title: Traffic
Writer: Sanjay (story), Bobby (story), Suresh Nair (screenplay), Piyush Mishra (dialogue), Prashant Pandey (dialogue)
Actors: Manoj Bajpayee, Jimmy Shergill, Parambrata Chatterjee, Divya Dutta
